article_title: Grandmother emotional as she sees family she thought were dead.
sentence: Grandmother  emotional  as  she  sees  family  she  thought  were  dead.

article_title: Grandmother emotional as she sees family she thought were dead.
sentence: She  explains  Yafa  believed  all  her  relatives  had  been  killed  in  Nir  Oz,  describing  an  emotional  moment  her  grandmother  "saw  them  and  realised  they  were  alive"  after  being  released.
